logica
Class Cell

java.lang.Object
  logica.Cell

public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object

Implements the Cell class, which is an extension of the Point class, with 2 more attributes: isHit and hasShip, that facilitate the generation of the HTML Board representation.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Vitor / Caio
